description:
Winner:
- Mobile Excellence Award for Best Mobile Utility Application
- App Gem Award from Macworld

Bloomberg Television is a 24 hour global business & financial news network that is watched by the most affluent and influential  viewers in the world.  It is supported by the world's largest international news bureau network with 146 bureaus in 72 countries. 

With Bloomberg TV+ Watch:
- Live TV: Bloomberg Television Live 24-hours a day
- The biggest business, finance and technology stories right now  
- Featured videos and breaking news stories directly from the homepage
- The most watched videos from the last 24 Hours and last 7 days across mobile and Bloomberg.com
- All the ‘New’ episodes added within channels since your last login, now tagged for easier discoverability
- Exclusive interviews with the most influential people in business, finance and technology
- Bloomberg's critically acclaimed shows on demand

Plus:
- Download videos for offline viewing
- Get extra content on people, companies and topics while watching 
- Search our extensive library of video content
- Add up to 10 personal channels for companies, people or topics and access them by adding them to the homepage’s ‘My Channels’ section
- Play audio in the background while browsing other apps         
- Activate subtitles for full episodes in channels
- Set and receive reminders for upcoming programs on Live TV as well as notification when new videos are added to your favorite On Demand channels
- Synchronize your playlist with Bloomberg.com
- Customize your interactive scrolling ticker and get the latest news and market information
- Share videos via Twitter, Facebook and Email
- Join the conversation via a live Twitter stream for select live TV shows

Shows available on demand include:
- Bloomberg West
- Street Smart
- Bloomberg Surveillance with Tom Keene
- Bloomberg In the Loop 
- Charlie Rose

Please send any feedback from within the app by going to the info section.
releaseNotes:
- Performance enhancements

Feedback is always welcome! Please continue to Rate our App. 
Thank you for using Bloomberg TV+
